solution_line_template: There will be {total_gold_coins} gold coins / {num_chests} chest= <<{total_gold_coins}/{num_chests}={gold_coins_per_chest}>>{gold_coins_per_chest} gold coins in every chest.
So, there will be {total_silver_coins} silver coins / {num_chests} chests = <<{total_silver_coins}/{num_chests}={silver_coins_per_chest}>>{silver_coins_per_chest} silver coins in each chest.

Then, the number of bronze coins is double the number of silver coins, so there are {bronze_multiplier} * {total_silver_coins} = <<{bronze_multiplier}*{total_silver_coins}={total_bronze_coins}>>{total_bronze_coins} bronze coins.
So there will be {total_bronze_coins} bronze coins / {num_chests} chests = <<{total_bronze_coins}/{num_chests}={bronze_coins_per_chest}>>{bronze_coins_per_chest} bronze coins in each chest.

Finally, the total number of coins in every chest will be {gold_coins_per_chest} gold coins + {silver_coins_per_chest} silver coins + {bronze_coins_per_chest} bronze coins = <<{gold_coins_per_chest}+{silver_coins_per_chest}+{bronze_coins_per_chest}={total_coins_per_chest}>>{total_coins_per_chest} coins.
